DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine EGFR status ( positive negative ) FISH predict response cetuximab therapy NSCLC patient treat carboplatin paclitaxel
DOC.brief_title: A Study Determine Whether EGFR Status FISH Can Predict Results Non Small Cell Lung Cancer ( NSCLC ) Patients Treated With Cetuximab , Carboplatin Paclitaxel
DOC.criteria: Subjects present Stage IV , Stage IIIB NSCLC recurrent disease follow radiation therapy surgical resection No prior chemotherapy antiEGFR target therapy Sufficient tumor material FISH test Measurable disease ( RECIST ) ECOG performance status 0 1 Symptomatic uncontrolled CNS metastasis Inadequate hematologic function define ANC < 1,500/mm3 , platelet count < 100,000/mm3 , hemoglobin level < 9 g/dl Inadequate hepatic function define total bilirubin > 1.25 x ULN , AST level > 1.5 x ULN , alkaline phosphatase > 5.0 x ULN Inadequate renal function define serum creatinine level > 1.5 x ULN
